meanings.sent1: After forgetting to invite her the first time, I had to reinvite Sarah to the party.
meanings.sent2: I will reinvite my friend to the movie night since she couldn't make it last time.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sent the invitation to the wrong address, so I had to reinvite the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The email got lost in the spam folder, prompting me to reinvite everyone to the virtual meeting.
meanings.sent5: To ensure everyone receives the message, I will reinvite them with a follow-up email.

meanings.sent1: Since she missed the first event, I decided to reinvite her to the upcoming picnic.
meanings.sent2: I will reinvite my cousin to the family reunion as she couldn't attend last time.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly told my friend I would reinvite her to the party if she brought extra snacks.
meanings.sent4: The team was so impressed with his presentation that they decided to reinvite him for future collaborations.
meanings.sent5: The museum curator was thrilled to reinvite the artist for another exhibition after the success of the previous one.
